body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

For example it is not clear which specific activity caused the issue:

[
![Screenshot 2023-11-28 at 10 41 44 AM](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/assets/1463622/08702091-8cf3-48c4-833a-d6e2fc5a00ee)
](URL)

This applies to other types of validation errors returned by the service.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Include information about activity id and type into the error message.
title: WorkflowTaskFailure due to validation errors should include the command information
